TopicTitle: Bug with Linus, Gene and Mortimer

Articles.Content:
If you start from scratch and dont close the help popups, as I did, the kerbals do like the paintings in Harry Potter : they go see each other ! Lol

Here is a pic from the Space center (first time entering)

![MLh6aEi.png](http://i.imgur.com/MLh6aEi.png)
Hmm. I couldn't replicate this. What build are you running, and if you exit and restart did it still do it?

Well, I have Windows 8.1.

Version was 1.0.1 so it might be resolved already?

Replication steps :

Start a brand new career game, and visit all the buildings without closing any help windows. Space center reliably breaks then.

Reproduced on Win7 x64. New career game. Start -> VAB -> Main -> Astronaut complex -> Main -> Admin (okay, so that might have been an excessive number of places to visit), without ever clicking "Thanks, I've got it" and the faces are overlapping.
